statements: UPDATE patients_health_data SET age = 30, health_data = '{"blood_pressure": 120/80}' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE patients_health_data SET gender = 'Female', data_timestamp = '2022-02-15 10:30:00' WHERE patient_id = 102;

UPDATE patients_health_data SET patient_name = 'John Doe', age = 35, gender = 'Male', health_data = '{"blood_pressure":120,"heart_rate":70}', data_timestamp = '2022-05-18 13:45:00' WHERE patient_id = 101;

UPDATE patients_health_data SET age = 40, health_data = '{"blood_pressure":130,"heart_rate":75}', patient_name = 'Jane Smith', gender = 'Female', data_timestamp = '2022-05-19 09:30:00' WHERE patient_id = 105;
UPDATE Patients SET age = 25, gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE HealthData SET blood_pressure = '120/80', temperature = 98.6 WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Patients SET age = age + 1, name = 'John Doe' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE HealthData SET heart_rate = 75, temperature = 98.6, blood_pressure = '120/80' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND timestamp = '2022-07-15 10:30:00';
UPDATE patients SET age = 25 WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE sensor_data SET data_value = 98.6, timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE data_id = 1;
UPDATE patients SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
UPDATE health_records SET heart_rate = 75, blood_pressure = '120/80', temperature = 98.6 WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE patients SET age = 25, room_number = 101 WHERE patient_id = 'f6cb1dbb-9da5-4bb4-a3b7-3f99b040e34f';
UPDATE blood_pressure SET systolic = 120, diastolic = 80, timestamp = '2023-09-15 08:30:00' WHERE patient_id = 'fb2f42d7-24a9-4ff8-936a-7d0435ef75ef';
UPDATE patients SET age = 30, room_number = 101 WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE blood_pressure SET systolic = 120, diastolic = 80 WHERE blood_pressure_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE Patients SET age = 35, condition = 'Stable' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE Doctors SET name = 'Dr. Smith', contact_number = '+1 (123) 456-7890' WHERE doctor_id = 201;
UPDATE Patients SET age = 30, condition = 'Stable' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE Devices SET device_status = 'Active', manufacturer = 'New Manufacturer' WHERE device_id = 201;
